title: DCBH Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 07 Junior Resident Posts
description: The Deep Chand Bandhu Hospital (DCBH) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 07 Junior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the DCBH Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, ...
